name: Hell Feast
description:
For how long can you prevent Belzebuth from ending the world ? Feed him what is in the mood for ! Sheep, pig, human ? Who knows ?

If that wasn't enough, his little servant Vaat will feed him whatever he finds on the ground so don't get distracted !

Controls
  • Move: WASD/Arrows
  • Lift/Throw: E

Developed for the MiniJam 110 with Jim De Oliveira. Music by DavidKBD.
